name: Monogolf - Golf It
description:
Monogolf is a new way to play golf, where you will use a flick technique to shot the ball and pot it.

Get right force make right angle and do some calculations to shot in right direction so that the ball could be pot.

Features:
* Different courts
* Maximum 4 shots to pot the ball.
* Gradual increase in difficulty.
* Test your skills.

Give us your feedback at m.nadeemunawar@gmail.com
